valueProps.text: Launches Edtech products that combine strong pedagogy with measurable outcomes.
Led Codingal to scale enrolments through partnerships and community.
Guides Edtech startups on pricing, funnels, and AI automation to improve unit economics.

pains: Need for strong pedagogy in EdTech
